src:
Viral Aksi Barbar Juru Masak di Purwodadi yang Lempar Panci hingga Kompor
03 Nov 2019, 08:30 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Foto: YouTube cahyaniryn

Purwodadi - Aksi juru masak di kafe Purwodadi ini jadi viral karena nampak barbar. Saat masak seafood, ia tak ragu melempar panci hingga kompor!Media sosial diramaikan dengan aksi barbar juru masak di Babalu Cafe, Purwodadi. Bernama Mas Antok, juru masak ini siap mengajak para tamu kafe untuk melihat aksi memasaknya di dapur.Dilihat dari akun YouTube @cahyaniryn, Mas Antok mempersilakan tamu masuk ke ruangan dapur yang tidak terlalu besar. Ia sudah menyiapkan bahan menu andalan kafe yaitu ragam seafood dan bumbu gurih pedas."Aku datang ke sini karena tertarik lagi viral di Instagram. Dia masak seafood lucu banget," kata Cahyaniryn di awal video. Ia pun disambut pekikan tutup panci yang dipukul keras-keras oleh Mas Antok."Ketemu lagi dengan saya, Mas Antok Babalu Cafe Purwodadi Jalan Diponegoro No.35. Kita liat ya," kata Mas Antok yang sudah bersiap dengan wajannya di atas kompor. Ia lalu menuang ember berisi penuh seafood. "Sorrr kabeh," katanya dengan heboh.



Baca juga: 
Bukan Mangkuk, Youtuber Ini Makan Bakso Pakai Dudukan Kloset Jongkok





Foto: YouTube cahyaniryn

Yang bikin unik, Mas Antok lalu melempar panci seafood ke arah kanan hingga terdengar bunyi lemparan yang keras. Disusul dengan lemparan kompor yang disebutnya sudah rusak.Mas Antok lalu melanjutkan aksinya dengan menuangkan bumbu cair berwarna kemerahan ke atas wajan. "Sorrr kabeh," teriaknya lagi dengan semangat sambil melempar panci bumbu setelahnya. Yang bikin tambah ngeri, di arah Mas Antok melempar alat masak, ada asistennya yang sudah sigap menghindari lemparan itu.


Foto: YouTube cahyaniryn

"Ini semuanya di sini ada biota laut. Ada cumi, udang, gurita, kerang tahu, kepiting, rajungan, kerang serimpi, kerang dara. Semua masuk sini, semua los," kata Mas Antok menjelaskan menunya. Harga menu yang ditawarkan terjangkau yaitu Rp 100.000 berisi ember penuh seafood.Usai melempar panci hingga kompor, Mas Antok menunjukkan kegilaan lainnya. "Ini kan api nyala ya, ini saya taruh atas kepala saya," kata Mas Antok sambil menaruh wajan panas di kepalanya. Setelah itu pria berkaca mata ini berujar, "Tangan saya taruh sini saya bakar. Ndak kebakar sama sekali."Sontak aksinya membuat Cahyaniryn dan pengunjung lain kaget. Sebab ia sama sekali tidak merasa panas. "Babalu Cafe, sor kabeh pokoknya," lanjutnya.Mas Antok menyelesaikan aksi memasaknya dalam waktu sebentar saja. "Masaknya cuma 5 menit selesai," tambah Mas Antok. Cahyaniryn yang berkesempatan mencoba seafood Mas Antok pun mengakui kelezatannya. Makin nikmat saat seafood bersama potongan jagung manis ini dilahap pakai tangan.


Foto: YouTube cahyaniryn

Hingga berita ini ditulis, video Cahyaniryn soal Mas Antok dan Babalu Cafe sudah disaksikan lebih dari 1,5 juta kali. Kolom komentar pun ramai diserbu netizen."Mas Antok, ikut Masterchef dong, tundukkan chef Juna ￼￼," kata seorang netizen. Ada pula yang berujar, "Itu perabotan semuanya sekali pake, the real chef ini mah, chef Juna mah lewaattt." Nah bagaimana pendapatmu?

Wanita Ini Masak Mie Instan Pakai Bunga dan Susu Dinyinyiri Netizen

text:
The Viral Action of the Barbarian Cook in Purwodadi who Throwed the Pot to the Stove
03 Nov 2019, 08:30 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Photo: YouTube cahyaniryn

Purwodadi - The action of the cook in the Purwodadi cafe became viral because it appeared barbaric. When cooking seafood, he did not hesitate to throw the pan to the stove! Social media was enlivened by the barbaric action of the cook at Babalu Cafe, Purwodadi. Named Mas Antok, the cook is ready to invite the guests of the cafe to see the cooking action in the kitchen. Seen from the @cahyaniryn YouTube account, Mas Antok invites guests into a kitchen room that is not too large. He has prepared a mainstay menu ingredients that are a variety of seafood cafes and spicy savory seasoning. "I came here because I was interested again viral on Instagram. He cooks really funny seafood," Cahyaniryn said at the beginning of the video. He was greeted with a scream of the lid of the pot which was beaten hard by Mas Antok. He then poured a bucket full of seafood. "Sorrr kabeh," he said excitedly.



Also read:
Not a Bowl, This Youtuber Eats Meatballs With Squat Toilet Holder





Photo: YouTube cahyaniryn

What makes it unique, Antok then throws the seafood pan to the right until you hear a loud toss. Followed by a stove which he called was damaged. Antok then continued his action by pouring reddish liquid liquid spices on the pan. "Sorrr kabeh," he shouted again excitedly, throwing a seasoning pan afterwards. What made me even more horrified was that in the direction of Antok throwing cooking utensils, there was an assistant who was ready to avoid the throw.


Photo: YouTube cahyaniryn

"These are all marine biota here. There are squid, shrimp, octopus, tofu clams, crabs, crabs, serimpi shells, virgin shells. All enter here, all stalls," said Mas Antok explaining the menu. The price of the menu offered is affordable at IDR 100,000 containing a bucket full of seafood. After throwing the pan up to the stove, Mas Antok shows another madness. "This is a flame, yes, I put it on my head," said Antok, putting a hot pan on his head. After that the man with glasses said, "I put my hand here, I burned it. It didn't burn at all." Suddenly the action made Cahyaniryn and other visitors surprised. Because he did not feel hot at all. "Babalu Cafe, sor kabeh anyway," he continued. Mr. Antok completed his cooking action in just a short time. "The cook only takes 5 minutes to finish," added Antok. Cahyaniryn, who had the opportunity to try seafood Antok, also acknowledged its deliciousness. The more delicious when the seafood together with sweet corn pieces are devoured by hand.


Photo: YouTube cahyaniryn

As of this writing, Cahyaniryn's video about Mas Antok and Babalu Cafe has been watched more than 1.5 million times. The comments column was crowded by netizens. "Mas Antok, join Masterchef, beat Chef Juna ￼￼," said a netizen. There are also those who say, "That's all the furniture used, the real chef, chef Juna mah lewaattt." Well what do you think?



Also read:
This Woman Cooks Instant Noodles Using Flowers and Milk Dinyiriiri Netizens
